entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
